attributes.action: National Campaign against general litter & fly-tipping.
attributes.additional_details:
The threat to people's general health/wellbeing, environment issues etc’ not to mention the extra financial burden on our nation, is huge.
The majority of us have had to tolerate this unacceptable behaviour for far too long, now is the time to clamp down on these issues, this nation needs to clean-up urgently!
Please support us loud and clear from Parliament and together we can have an impact, isolated volunteer groups like 'Pick Up 4 Pendle' are limited, we are truly in this together and expect your full support!
attributes.background:
WE HAVE HAD ENOUGH RHETORIC:
Plastic-Bottle Banks.
A general reduction in packaging.
Reducing plastic production.
More enforcement officers to drive the message home.
(Significant attention needed on the abuse from motorists, on roads and parking areas.)

rejection.details:
Increase penalties, enforcement and education to tackle littering & fly tipping:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324488
